name: BLINK Triple Care Eye Drops for Dry Eyes, Lubricant Eye Drops, Soothing for Moderate to Severe Dry Eyes, with Hyaluronate, Reduces Discomfort, Long-Lasting Hydration, 0.34 Fl Oz
short_description: Relief with every Blink: Experience extended dry eye symptom relief with Blink Triple Care Lubricating Eye Drops. This 3-in-1 formula instantly soothes, gives extra long-lasting hydration, and seals in moisture.

Dry Eye Lubricant: Discover what makes Blink Triple Care Lubricating Eye Drops different from other eye drops. Our drops for dry eyes have a dual-action moisture seal to lock in moisture for instant, long-lasting relief. The secret to our drops is a water-based formula enhanced with natural oil, which helps keep tears from evaporating too quickly
Long-Lasting Hydration: Blink Triple Care Lubricating Eye Drops are formulated with hyaluronate - also found in your eyes - to boost hydration. Hydrate like your tears for extra long-lasting comfort
Reduce Everyday Discomfort: These dops for dry eyes deliver extended relief for moderate to severe dry eye symptoms

Trusted Brand: Blink has a range of products to meet your eye and contact lens care needs, from drops for dry eyes to lock in moisture, to preservative-free formulas; and contact lens drops to keep your contacts clean and hydrated. Blink products provide comfort and hydration, to help your eyes feel moisturized & protected
product_description: Blink Triple Care Lubricating Eye Drops are designed for moderate to severe dry eye symptoms, locking in moisture for instant, long-lasting relief. The secret to the Triple Care solution is a water-based formula, enhanced with natural oil that can tackle evaporative dry eye. The added oil helps keep tears from evaporating too quickly, allowing it to relieve evaporative dry eye symptoms with a few drops and a blink. Designed to help dry eyes, these drops ensure your eyes stay lubricated, providing instant relief. Embrace the triple-treat of benefits - instantly soothing, extended hydration, and moisture-lock that keeps your eyes moisturized. Our 3-in-1 Extended Relief formula is your ultimate partner in relieving dryness day and night. The small, portable bottle can easily be carried in a pocket or purse, for on-the-go soothed, hydrated eyes. It's time to blink away dryness and unlock long-lasting comfort. Experience a day of moisturized eyes with Blink, because your eyes deserve the best.

name: Blink Contacts Lubricating Eye Drops with Hyaluronate, Moisturizing & Soothing for Soft & RGP Contact Lenses, Refreshes Lenses, Hydrating & Comforting Daily Eye Care, 0.34 Fl Oz
short_description: Relief with Every Blink: Blink Contacts Lubricating Eye Drops moisturize dry contact lenses to provide long-lasting comfort. These drops work with the eye's natural tears to help keep your contact lenses feeling fresh and comfortable all day

Hydration Boost with Hyaluronate: Our moisturizing eye drops instantly moisturize dry lenses. Our unique hyaluronate formulate works as a hydration booster to help contacts stay refreshed and comfortable through end of day

Comfort till End of Day: Blink Contacts Lubricating Eye Drops are formulated with beneficial electrolytes similar to those found in natural tears. Enjoy the freedom to wear your soft or RGP lenses while experiencing long-lasting comfort

Moisturizes Dry Lenses: The Blink Contacts Lubricating Eye Drops rewet and moisturize lenses before insertion and during wear, moisturizing and refreshing lenses. They reduce the feeling of contact lens dryness to help maintain comfort to the end of the day and reduce discomfort that may lead to removing your lenses early

Trusted Brand: Blink has a range of products to meet your eye and contact lens care needs, from drops for dry eyes to lock in moisture, to preservative-free formulas; and contact lens drops to keep your contacts clean and hydrated. Blink products provide comfort and hydration, to help your eyes and contacts feel moisturized
product_description: Blink Contact Lubricating Eye Drops for soft and RGP lenses. Blinking is the eye's natural way of replenishing the tear film. Experience relief with every blink and keep your contact lenses feeling refreshed and comfortable through end of day. Experience instant moisture with Blink Contact Drops, with a unique hyaluronate formula that works with your natural tears to help them feel fresh and comfortable. Formulated with beneficial electrolytes similar to those found in your own natural tears, these drops are suitable for your daily eye care routine. Blink Contacts Lubricating Eye Drops have been formulated for use with both soft and rigid gas permeable (RGP) contact lenses. The drops may be used to rewet and moisturize lenses before insertion and during wear. They reduce the feeling of contact lens dryness to help maintain comfort to the end of the day. The small, portable bottle can easily be carried in a pocket or purse, for on-the-go use. Elevate your lens-wearing experience with Blink Contacts Lubricating Eye Drops and experience confident, hydrated contact lens wear.

product_description: TheraTears Dry Eye Therapy Lubricating Eye Drops provide immediate, long-lasting relief from dry eye symptoms such as burning, itching, irritation, and discomfort. Created by an ophthalmologist after 18 years of research, TheraTears Dry Eye Therapy’s unique hydrating formula contains OxyLytes, the 5 vital electrolytes found in natural tears. TheraTears eye drops work like human tears to moisturize and lubricate the eyes, restoring eyes’ natural balance. Place 1-2 drops in each eye for rapid, hydrating relief that lasts a long time. TheraTears lubricating eye drops are recommended by doctors* for dry eye relief. TheraTears Dry Eye Therapy is eligible for coverage with most FSA/HSA plans; check your health plan for details. *ProVoice Survey data collected 9/1/23-8/31/24

product_description: Moisturize your soft contact lenses for excellent wearing comfort with renu MultiPlus Lubricating & Rewetting Drops. Lubricating & Rewetting Drops refresh your eyes anytime while wearing your soft contact lenses. renu MultiPlus drops contain povidone, an effective lubricant that provides moisturizing comfort. Ideal for rewetting daily wear or extended wear lenses and disposable lenses prescribed for frequent replacement. If you wear extended wear lenses, this solution can be used to rewet your lenses after sleep. Features : Effectively lubricates and rewets soft contact lenses during wear Directions: During contact lens wear, put 2 or 3 drops on contact lens whenever needed. Blink several times. If the lens still does not feel comfortable, add another drop. If discomfort persists, IMMEDIATELY remove the lens and contact your eye care professional.

From Visine, a brand backed by 60 years of expertise, these sterile eye drops offer fast-acting redness relief that also lubricate and refresh. The small bottle easily slips into a bag or purse, so you can relieve your red eyes anywhere, even on-the-go.
